title: Enhance template detection reporting with educational feedback
description: Improve the template detection output to be more educational. Show confidence breakdown as a visual bar chart, explain why each template scored points, show how close other templates were, and provide tips for writing better specs. Add an optional --explain flag for detailed breakdowns. This helps users learn the pattern matching system.
notes:
MEDIUM IMPACT - Phase 2 Onboarding/Education. Addresses 'Template Detection Transparency' pain point. Current reporting shows reasoning but isn't educational. New version teaches users how detection works.

COMPLETED: Enhanced template detection reporting with comprehensive educational feedback:

1. Visual Confidence Bars:
   - 20-block bar charts for all templates
   - Proportional fill based on confidence %
   - Winner marker (âœ“ SELECTED)
   - Quick visual comparison

2. Scoring Breakdown (Why This Template Won):
   - Each keyword match with point value (HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW signals)
   - Exact quotes from spec showing where found
   - Educational 'Why it matters' for each match
   - Total score calculation shown

3. Missing Keyword Education:
   - Show what wasn't found but would have changed outcome
   - Point values for missing keywords
   - How to trigger each template with examples

4. Other Templates Comparison:
   - Detailed breakdown for each non-selected template
   - What points it scored and why
   - What keywords were missing
   - 'When to use' guidance (educational)

5. Spec Quality Feedback:
   - Tiered feedback based on confidence (90%+, 50-89%, <50%)
   - Specific praise for high-confidence specs
   - Actionable improvements for medium/low confidence
   - Examples of what to add

6. Tips for Better Specs:
   - Actionable advice for future specifications
   - Domain-specific terminology examples
   - Technology stack guidance
   - Confidence breakdown scale with user's position marked

7. Optional Flags:
   - --explain (maximum detail with line numbers)
   - --quiet (minimal output for experienced users)
   - Default mode (educational, balanced)

Files updated:
- .claude/commands/smart-bootstrap.md (added educational reporting section after Step 3)
- .claude/reference/template-selection-rules.md (added comprehensive Educational Feedback section)

This transforms template detection from a black box into a learning experience that helps users write better specs over time.
user_benefit: Users understand why templates were selected and learn how to write better specs for future projects
